com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.Shape
      com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.Text
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Text
extends Shape

This class stores all the information about a String of Text, and manages its drawing.

Since:
17/05/2004
Version:
0.1
Author:
David Terei
See Also:
Serialized Form

resize

public void resize(double percent)
Description copied from class: Shape
Resize the shape, according to the double value percent, specified. This method allows shapes to be 'zoomed' in on.

Specified by:
resize in class Shape
Parameters:
percent - The size, in decimals, for the shape to be, relative to its 'base' size. So a value of 2 will double the shape compared to its original value.
